original_text: He sent letters to all the royal provinces, to every province in its own script and to every people in its own language, that every man be master in his own household and speak according to the language of his people.
korean_text: 각 지방 각 백성의 문자와 언어로 모든 지방에 조서를 내려 이르기를 남편이 자기의 집을 주관하게 하고 자기 민족의 언어로 말하게 하라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: He sent letters to all the royal provinces
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 왕의 속령으로 편지를 보냈다

sentences.original_text: to every province in its own script
and to every people in its own language
that every man be master in his own household
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 남자가 각기 자기 집의 주인이 되도록

sentences.original_text: and speak according to the language of his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 백성의 언어에 따라 말하도록
